line.text: The forward violet thus did I chide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sweet thief whence didst thou steal thy sweet that smells
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If not from my love breath The purple pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which on thy soft check for complexion dwells
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In my love veins thou hast too grossly dyed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The lily I condemned for thy hand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And buds of marjoram had stoln thy hair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The roses fearfully on thorns did stand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: One blushing shame another white despair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A third nor red nor white had stoln of both
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to his robbery had annexed thy breath
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But for his theft in pride of all his growth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A vengeful canker eat him up to death
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: More flowers I noted yet I none could see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But sweet or colour it had stoln from thee
